freemarker.template

接口 TemplateSequenceModel

  • 所有超级接口:
    TemplateModel
    所有已知实现类:
    ArrayModel, CollectionAndSequence, CollectionModel, DefaultArrayAdapter, DefaultListAdapter, JythonSequenceModel, NodeListModel, NodeListModel, NodeModel, OverloadedMethodsModel, RhinoFunctionModel, RhinoScriptableModel, SimpleList, SimpleMethodModel, SimpleSequence, StringArraySequence, TemplateModelListSequence

    public interface TemplateSequenceModel
extends TemplateModel
    "sequence" template language data type; an object that contains other objects accessible through an integer 0-based index.

    Used in templates like: mySeq[index], <#list mySeq as i>...</#list>, mySeq?size, etc.

    另请参阅:
    TemplateCollectionModel

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 freemarker.template.TemplateModel

        NOTHING

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      TemplateModel get(int index)
      Retrieves the i-th template model in this sequence.
      int size() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        TemplateModel get(int index)
           throws TemplateModelException
        Retrieves the i-th template model in this sequence.
        返回:
        the item at the specified index, or null if the index is out of bounds. Note that a null value is interpreted by FreeMarker as "variable does not exist", and accessing a missing variables is usually considered as an error in the FreeMarker Template Language, so the usage of a bad index will not remain hidden, unless the default value for that case was also specified in the template.
        抛出:
        TemplateModelException

      • size

        int size()
  throws TemplateModelException
        返回:
        the number of items in the list.
        抛出:
        TemplateModelException
